channel.title: How to add member ite m to item!
channel.description:
hello can some tel me how to add member to my server
how can i get the item to be member item only member can use the item???

item.title: How to add member ite m to item!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

In the wear() method call:

if (isMember(itemID) return false;

And place this somewhere:

int memberItems = {};
boolean isMember (int item) {
	for (int i : memberItems)
		if (item == i) return true;
			
	return false;
}

Read full topic
item.source: How to add member ite m to item!
